name: Ondansetron
warningsAndPrecautions: ondansetron orally disintegrating tablets , usp 4 mg ( 4 mg ondansetron base ) white , circular , flat faced , uncoated tablets ‘ g ’ engraved one side ‘ 4 ’ side : ndc : 70518-3512-00 ndc : 70518-3512-01 ndc : 70518-3512-02 ndc : 70518-3512-03 ndc : 70518-3512-04 ndc : 70518-3512-05 ndc : 70518-3512-06 ndc : 70518-3512-01 packaging : 30 1 box , unit dose packaging : 6 1 box , unit dose packaging : 10 1 box , unit dose packaging : 20 1 box , unit dose packaging : 12 1 box , unit dose packaging : 9 1 box , unit dose packaging : 21 1 box , unit dose packaging : 15 1 box , unit dose store 20°c 25°c ( 68°f 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ondansetron Orally Disintegrating Tablets, USP
                  4 mg (as 4 mg ondansetron base) are white, circular, flat faced, uncoated tablets with ‘G’ engraved on one side and ‘4’ on the other side in:
                  NDC: 70518-3512-00
                  NDC: 70518-3512-01
                  NDC: 70518-3512-02
                  NDC: 70518-3512-03
                  NDC: 70518-3512-04
  
NDC: 70518-3512-05
 
                  NDC: 70518-3512-06
                  NDC: 70518-3512-01
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BOX, UNIT DOSE
                  PACKAGING: 6 in 1 BOX, UNIT DOSE
                  PACKAGING: 10 in 1 BOX, UNIT DOSE
                  PACKAGING: 20 in 1 BOX, UNIT DOSE
                  PACKAGING: 12 in 1 BOX, UNIT DOSE
  
PACKAGING: 9 in 1 BOX, UNIT DOSE
 
                  PACKAGING: 21 in 1 BOX, UNIT DOSE
                  PACKAGING: 15 in 1 BOX, UNIT DOSE
                  
                  
                  
                  Store at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  
                  
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
